name: Discharge
description: Lead your drones into an epic battle for the last iridium on the planet.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 | AMD Radeon HD 7950 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon RX 570 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space
